content.data: The following options are available in the primary Report Center View
Click on the sidebar options below for more information

It is important to note that the Report Center will remember the last Printer
    you printed an  individual  Report too. This is a handy feature when printing a Report Group with Reports that need to go to different Printers. The Report Center
    will send each individual Report in the Group to the last Printer the Report printed to. It is important to note it will only remember the last Printer for that report when and  only     when Printing that Report from within a Report Group. When Printing it individual the Printer will always default to the last Printer used.
